overview: Join YouTube megastar DanTDM on an epic adventure! Filmed at the Eventim Apollo Hammersmith, see Dan live in action with his pugs, Dr Trayaurus, Craig the Mailman and lots of other well-loved friends – as well as a few audience members – as they try to save the day, solving puzzles and playing games as they go.
tagline: The world famous YouTuber's new live show!
title: DanTDM On Tour
